section.heading: Rental Accommodations Division of the Department of Housing and Community Development.
section.text: There is established within the Department of Housing and Community Development the Rental Accommodations Division, which shall have as its head a Rent Administrator.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Merit system classification policy and grade levels, see § 1-611.01.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 42-3401.03, § 42-3501.03, and § 42-3502.04b.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2003(c) of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).

annoGroup.heading: Expiration of Law
annoGroup.annotation: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3502.01.
